results.title: Extrapyramidal side effect of donepezil hydrochloride in an elderly patient
results.text_hl: Other tests revealed no abnormalities apart from multiple @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodules@@@ on ultrasonography.
